Posts.Content: I am very sorry to hear of your burns. I cannot understand how the radiation went to your back but do know the radiation does penetrate the soft tissue and your problem may stem from where and how the radiation treatments were set up. The radiolgist should be able to give you some salve that is for severe burns.  My daughter used this and also used Vitamin E on the burns as well. Because the burns are not topical only but go deep, it is difficult to get complete relief. You may also want to consider some detoxing for the radiation within the rest of your body. The radiation can cause future long term side effects; good to try to clear your good cells. There is a some good information on a recent blog I did that addressed radiation, the short link is:  http://wp.me/p28FKS-20  It gives you details on how to fight the radiation effects.  You need it for treatment but the side effects need addressing too. I wish you much success.
Posts.Title: radiation to the breast

Posts.Content: Radiation to any part of the body can cause effects long term. Also you need to look at your mother's condition as it relates to her passing the condition onto her overspring.
Posts.Title: radiation to the breast

Posts.Content: I agree, we have to be our own judge of what sound logical. Most things that contain soy in the US is GMO as well as corn products. We have to be careful or we will be overwhelmed with engineered foods and products.  Many nutriionists tell you it is not necessary to eat products that are organic, only certain ones but it is not just the pesticides that we worry about but much of what is in the earth that the plants absorb and becomes part of the plant or fruit thereof, we have to carefully watch and buy only organic non GMO products, or we will be just fooling ourselves.  Also many tell you low fat, although fats are actually not bad as they have been telling us; we need certain fats. It is far better to eat organic butter than to eat some manufactured spread, our bodies know what butter is. And eggs are no doubt one of the most complete foods but somewhere someone made a study and told people not to eat them. Again a good organic egg is complete and our brains love them.  A few good chickens will supply you with wholesome eggs and they happy little personalities will keep you stress free as you tend your little girls.
Posts.Title: Are you Estrogen positive Breast cancer and think you know what caused it?

Posts.Content: Sounds like you are discovering what the cause is. We do this everyday with those that come to Jesicha's Hope, it is amazing to find what people ate and used as products thinking it was all safe but truly added up to them creating cancer in their bodies.  There is estrogen or estrogen like substances in so many products is it no wonder breast cancer is so high in the US.
Posts.Title: Are you Estrogen positive Breast cancer and think you know what caused it?

Posts.Content: I have a friend that has been on more chemo than anyone I know and it keeps her going. She has a great attitude and that may why she does not complain at all the things she has lost due to it.  Jokingly she calls herself the bionic woman, fake boobs, fake eyelashes, fake hair, fake nails, fake eyebrows; she said if she loses anything else she will be a robot.  With that said it has been four years since she lost her hair, three for her nails, lashes and eyebrows, and none have ever grown back.  Her doctors say they thought they would all grow back; as she says in other words they don't know they just do a lot of thinking.
Posts.Title: 2 years after chemo, my hair has not grown back

Posts.Content: My daughter had reconstruction, they started it during the surgery. They implanted a stretcher and expanded it over time. When the skin was stretched enough, they put the gel implant behind the mucsle to give it a more natural look and when you move the muscle gives it a more natural response. It was the process that she had the most pain and discomfort from. When they found more cancer and it was behind the impant, they removed it and had to do it over again. The second time around it was less uncomfortable. She did during the process had problems or discomfort when she raised her arms, but that was not as bad as other pains she had to endure.
Posts.Title: Questions about breast reconstruction

Posts.Content: Jesicha never did get to finish the reconstruction; the radiation burns held up the finishing of it. If she had to do it over again, I think she would have still done it, she was young and her surgeon was excellent. She never had a problem afterwards but we have to remember she lived with the reconstuction only a couple of years. One thing she found was the implant heats up unlike normal tissue so she found when she underwent whole body hyperthermia, she had to put something cold over the breast area first to cool down the implant, then go into the chamber.
Posts.Title: Questions about breast reconstruction

Posts.Content: I am very sorry for your trials and tribulations. While we are facing our tribulations we often believe we are all alone, but we are not, and it is then and now if you look only one set of footprints appear; you creator is carrying you. When your fears are at their greatest, give in and let God. Though it sounds so easy to say, I do this everyday and have gotten through some very tough times.  Just when I wanted to give in and give up, a voice within me says now is the time to give in but let God.  I also find joy in everyday, no matter how hard, no matter how difficult the day; there is a gift there somewhere.  Hidden beneath all the sorrows, fears and pain, a joy is hidden. Your little boy needs your love, no matter how sick you are, your love still thrives, give it to him openly and abundantly.  I know you can do it, God loves you and he will give you all the strength you desire; ask and you shall recieve. Your healing is within you; trust in what God has given this earth.  There are many alternative treatments that are out there, they have no side effects and allow the body to help itself unlike conventional that take your quality of life; you son needs the most of you.  Jesicha's Hope is all about giving support straight from our hearts; giving resources full of hope and like God's love we give it freely.  Jesicha knew the pain, the fear and all that went with facing cancer; I cradled her in my heart and together we journeyed.  I give you peace and love in your journey, just call upon me whenever you need. I am here for you.
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: I had one client last year that had your type. What kind of treatment are you doing? You are right there is not much on it and perhaps that is because it does not get much press due to its rather rare occurence. message me and I will see what I find about the other woman.
Posts.Title: Adneosquamous Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Your Mom needs to rebuild her immune system and detox in order to help her body rid itself of unwanted toxins left from the chemo. Many people have late effects of the chemo months and years later, if left to do damage that is not good. She will do well is you add green juice to her diet. This helps to detoxify as well as rebuild. Broccoli is important. There are many different options to use. Several support clients are using super food that contains the nutrients you need. Energy, good sense of feeling better and good immune system seems to result. If you contact me [google Jesicha's Hope] I can get you the link to get it and a good green juice recipe.  Also, make sure she remains in an alkaline state as well as be sure to take refined sugars out of the diet and replace only with natural occuring sugars so the body will treat them as food. I also advocate eliminating chemical products out of your lifestyle, cleaning supplies, soaps, etc, even sunscreen, lotions... there are natural replacements. It is amazing to read biopsy reports of chemicals found in these products in tumors, they love chemicals, so lets not give them any chemicals. Hope this helps you out.
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: Annmarie Your story is encouraging to others. Yes, cancer does not have to be the scary fearful diagnosis that they make it out to be. I am wondering if you had to do over, what choice would you make -1. nothing conventional and do all that you have learned to do or 2. exactly the same thing.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy v. Mastectomy

Posts.Content: First, did you read who is behind the article? The makers of the drug they are pushing in the article. So the article is biased to the degree it did not go into truthful details about breast cancer. You can have sore breasts for a number of normal reasons, you can have a lump that is not cancer [always have all lumps check out], breast tenderness can occur normally as well [pregnancy, periods etc are normal reasons]. Most breast cancers are not genetically occuring; by far most are most likely due to environmental circumstances.  If you eat well, don't consume or come in contact with chemical laden products; exercise and get checked regularly by your GYN, you will be doing the most proactive thing possible. It is not a guarantee and your doctor through exams and a thermography or ultrasound rather than mammogram, will find early signs of cancer if it occurs. Don't be scared by an article that does not have full or correct information.
Posts.Title: Risk factors responsible for breast cancer

Posts.Content: There are number of very good options to look into. Protocel has had several names over the years and it not what I consider an active cancer treatment an alternative practitioner would consider as an optiumum choice. If you want to do the best for yourself, look into treatments used that rid cancer in clinic settings. We have an organization that just lists options with explanations. It is just an educational and support site started by Jesicha who had breast cancer. google Jesicha's Hope and read through the researched info.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: The others are right, most DCIS stage 0 are just cells that are slightly abnormal and ofen disappear; we usually have many of these during our lifetime and history shows before the conventional industry got into their over treatment mode, doctors would watch these come and go in their patients. So now they want to over treat and over test - and in doing so they actually are creating cancer through mammograms and other invasive testing and treating. I have heard of some women that came to me where their doctors influenced them into having invasive surgery for DCIS stage 0. This is insanity - to cause cancer where there was none. And not to mention the ongoing side effects from unnecessary chemo or radiation too. If I were you, I would demand - ultrasound! The others are right - no mammograms. Thermography also will show things the mammograms do not.  I did a whole article on our blog regarding mammograms - it is not something you want to do when there are safer methods. With your side effects now - you need to strengthen you heart and liver, these are the two most common organs damaged through chemo, these are late effects that will appear at any time.  I would detox - sauna, green juice. Also add to your diet - Vitamin C - liposomal will get to your cells; about 2 grams of liposomal curcumin - best one is longvida curcumin. And use a whole food supplement like BioSuperFood. These are simple but potent measures. This should keep you in remission. Watch your blood through testing and if anything begins to appear - there are potent measures that will not harm you but will kick the cancer cells. For blood they have some good hyperthemia measures and put the blood through a magnetic process. So much new exciting things out there in corners of the earth that believe in cures.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: It is so amazing to meet people with like minds, just when I though my brain was going to explode today from all the propaganda spewing out from the kool aid drinking masses; I ready your words. Oh thank you Diana. I had this conversation yesterday with someone, how is it that doctors can, [knowing the truth] administer chemo and radiation or cut and slice someone up; with the full knowledge they will be spreading it, not curing it and dumping into the body what will most likely kill them; with of course the truth and real cures right at their finger tips? I know regulations prevent them from publicly administering alternatives but they KNOW and they don't TELL. I said there is no excuse in my moral mind, they are doing wrong. My friend said ---- bannility of evil. So today my blog will be on that subject. Anyone that agrees with this thinking, as you do Diana and other posters here, please we need to not just do this alone, I spend 18 hours a day talking and helping, and there are so many more out there seeking and cannot find. There are not one or two options, there are many options that cure cancer. IPT, hyperthermia, BX Antitoxin, DCA and others, most used in combination; all are curing, not treating but curing.  If any would like to help get the word out and help others find solutions please contact me. You can find me at Jesicha's Hope. jesichashope.org - and do read our Jesicha's story, it is the truths she uncovered that brings me here today.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: I can relate to your running from the hospital. We did the same. When we went to get the final records before heading off to MX, the cancer center head nurse tried to me Jesicha looked too frail to leave the hospital. We were only there to pick up records. We told the nurse she was nervous and had a glass of wine at lunch - she bought the story - and out the door we went before someone else showed up. And yes, they did give her that 'talking to' about denial and all that crap. It is indeed a war - against true healing - all for that profit gain.  I have been well aware of most doctors and clinics that are offering hope and healing. Glad you found yours with Dr. Forysthe, he is excellent. And yes, if you want to find out what is really wrong, the Greek blood test is excellent.  I know of a few that are using other means as well. The fact is there are many roads to wellness, but chem and radiation is no one of them. If you did not hit the blog button on the site read the blog posted last night - I have gotten a lot of good inquires from some very compassionate doctors - it is often good to take a stand so long as you are willing to remain on your pinnacle to be viewed.  www.jesichashope.wordpress.com
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Diana - you are so right - we are considered as if we are simple minded and how dare we question them or for heavens sake not bow down. One great thing we have going for us is we are lay people and we are not treating or administering or advising anyone on healthcare - we are just giving options and opening eyes to the truth in order for other to save their lives.  Cancer is big money business, it is a business and people do not want to accept they are just a customer and most times are not thought of as a real person.  You might think I am wrong but just tell your doctor you are thinking of skipping chemo and watch that nice smile and bedside manner turn rather ugly.  I had to deal with some of those ugly manners, makes you really rethink professionalism.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: I don't know of any research done but my feeling would be that they do not know of the real causes of RSD and therefore if they don't know then it is reasonable to assume we cannot know what effect radiation will have on your condition. What we do know is radiation effects and damages cells and nerve tissue, if your RSD is effected by such changes you may see a change in your RSD condition.
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: My daughter had TNBC hidden behind an Her+ tumor - so it was difficult. She used western medicine until it did nothing, she switched to alternatives and it was amazing to see the tumors melt away.  She started Jesicha's Hope to give out info and options that are hard to find. When your sick you are overwhelmed and nice to have a lot of info already researched.  Just google it and there is a lot there.  The number one thing that seems to work is SPDT. Cancer does not get resistant to it and no side effects.  I have also seen Rigvir work and hyperthermia, both local and whole body; ozone is good also, and there are IV's that work well. Point is there are many options to look through and many if combined will bring agressive cancers under control.  Those with aggressively progressing cancers are more difficult and they need a lot hitting the cancer from several angles, cutting off blood supply, stopping proliferation, starving cells, and weakening the cells; all are needed in order to gain ground ahead of the proliferation. The immune system is most important as it is your only defense against pathogens; you can kill them but then the body must protect itself.  This is a big reason why chemo patients get so many secondary infections, often what kills them.  Changing lifestyle is a great move, it is when you eliminate the cause or causes that you will no longer have the environment that will produce cancer or keep feeding it.
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: If you have a smell, go to your Gyn and ask that he or she take a look. Surprisingly the smell that strong should be accompanied by some other symptom.  You mention no pain, redness, soreness, swelling, etc; this is odd for a breast cancer to have advanced to a point of smelling with no other symptom but there is always that case that surprises us. Most breast cancers that smell are usually open tumors and yes it has a dead skin with bacteria growth kind of smell, pretty nasty and it is hard to hide. Let us know what you find out.  - By the way - ask your doctor to do a sonogram not a mammagram, if there is a chance you have breast cancer and it is advanced the mammagram will produce too much pressure and spreading has been noted. A sonogram will show details of the breasts and will give a doctor the information in full detail.
Posts.Title: Should I be Concerned?

Posts.Content: The others are right, most DCIS stage 0 are just cells that are slightly abnormal and ofen disappear; we usually have many of these during our lifetime and history shows before the conventional industry got into their over treatment mode, doctors would watch these come and go in their patients. So now they want to over treat and over test - and in doing so they actually are creating cancer through mammograms and other invasive testing and treating. I have heard of some women that came to me where their doctors influenced them into having invasive surgery for DCIS stage 0. This is insanity - to cause cancer where there was none. And not to mention the ongoing side effects from unnecessary chemo or radiation too. If I were you, I would demand - ultrasound! The others are right - no mammograms. Thermography also will show things the mammograms do not.  I did a whole article on our blog regarding mammograms - it is not something you want to do when there are safer methods. With your side effects now - you need to strengthen you heart and liver, these are the two most common organs damaged through chemo, these are late effects that will appear at any time.  I would detox - sauna, green juice. Also add to your diet - Vitamin C - liposomal will get to your cells; about 2 grams of liposomal curcumin - best one is longvida curcumin. And use a whole food supplement like BioSuperFood. These are simple but potent measures. This should keep you in remission. Watch your blood through testing and if anything begins to appear - there are potent measures that will not harm you but will kick the cancer cells. For blood they have some good hyperthemia measures and put the blood through a magnetic process. So much new exciting things out there in corners of the earth that believe in cures.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Diana - It is not about your books it is about the offending a side - but to you and me there are not sides; life is not about sides, it is about suviving and fighting for life.  I really don't care about what feelings I hurt when it comes to my life or that of someone I love. I tell it like it is; and if a doctor lies to you or refused to treat you because you are going to ruin his statisitics, I am sorry but he doesn't deserve my caring about his feelings. We should all be given the right of choice but we are not; the cancer industry should not force upon us three choices, all theirs, the they profit from. It is our bodies, should be our choices. If someone wants conventional then I support their decision, but I also support that each should be given options and when people are surprised there are options out there and have not been told, that is not fair.  We should not have to be scolded for stand up for some truths about choices. The right to survive is our inalienable right.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: There are number of very good options to look into. Protocel has had several names over the years and it not what I consider an active cancer treatment an alternative practitioner would consider as an optiumum choice. If you want to do the best for yourself, look into treatments used that rid cancer in clinic settings. We have an organization that just lists options with explanations. It is just an educational and support site started by Jesicha who had breast cancer. google Jesicha's Hope and read through the researched info.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Cheers always to you Springflowers for sharing your story. It is a story worthy of being shared.  You are right, do nice things for your body, it will heal if you feed and take care of it nicely.  It wants to serve you and today we seem hell bent to destroy our dear castle - like we can go get another.  Laser is one of the best methods to remove certain tumors however some are not able to be dealt with using laser but there are still wonderful treatments that will do no harm to your body but will indeed kill the cancer.  And at the end of the day - treat the body with kindness - feed it with organics - not synthetic foods - and clean it and around it with no chemicals. It will serve you for a long time.
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: Yes - they have indicated such trauma often precedes RSD. It would then seem to be that RSD is resulting from damage to the neurological system within the traumatized area.  If then you receive radiation that may further traumatize the given area, there is a likelihood you will have increased suffering from your RSD.  I would like to see evidence that it will not occur before I took that risk as RSD is most painful and I would not wish you in more agony if you need not be. I would look for a solution that will not harm your tissue further.  I will ask about my circles to see if I can arrive at more specific data. If you have further details you think would be good to know message me.
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...

Posts.Content: Sarah - so glad to hear about your Mum and that she is standing strong. Remember the majority some five hundred years ago believed the earth be flat - a minority believed it round; stand upon your beliefs though it may be of the minority, you are not alone. Jesicha was raised believing in natural medicine yet when faced with cancer and on her own, she would admit today, influence played a huge role; yet when her eyes opened wide to see the truth her determination overcame her. She abandoned the chem and radiation; beat the cancer. Jesicha's Hope was begun to spread the truth and word of options; and it continues.  Her story and my story of keeping that promise has led me to meet some fantastic researchers; my research mind has been filled with revolutionary concepts.  Many old ideas from researchers decades ago are rediscovered and revisited; herein lies some fantastic research. Cancer does not have to be a death sentence nor is it a chronic condition to be treated with chemo and radition until the treatment finally gets you. The more you did into conventional the more you realize what the public is not told. The more you did into alternative the more you realize what is being hidden from the public. Don't let your Mum roast her innards as you say; chemo and radiation does not work for pancreatic cancer, she is in a perfect postion to kill it and lead a wonderfully happy decade or two more.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Not sure what he is looking for. You might want to try asking him or her what the concern is; you have the right to know what a doctor is doing and why. Mammograms do not show everything; thermography or ultrasound shows more and sooner. Insurance does not like to pay for it; but if you insist the doctor can make the insurance company pay it.  If he said there was a bulge in the chest wall, it could be any number of other things, something as simple as a cyst that is benign and he would watch it.  Also there are many things to do once you have knowledge of what is going on.  Worry will not make it better or go away. Instead do what you are doing, be positive and seek much information so when a decision needs to be made you have the right options in front of you.  We deal with these things everyday; if you need some support google Jesicha's Hope and ask for support, it is not good to feel alone or scared. Hope is alive.
Posts.Title: Breast MRI or Chest MRI

Posts.Content: This depends on a lot of variables. You should ask your OB/Gyn and have him or her take a good look. If you are breastfeeding or have breastfed recently sometimes ducts get hard and feel like a lump. If you have ever had an infection, mastitis, while breastfeeding, the milk duct that is infected no longer operates and often you can feel that spot long after as a hard lump. Your doctor can determine this easily. The fact your breast is also tender may signify an infection that is ongoing or some other problem and that could be cancer but until it is looked at you will not know. My suggestion or opinion would be to call and get an appointment soon and get it checked out.
Posts.Title: can this be breast cancer

Posts.Content: Good, I would make a good point in making sure the oncologist saw this lump under your arm and hopefully order a scan or biospy of it to see what you are dealing with.
Posts.Title: can this be breast cancer

Posts.Content: Did you have surgery for the thyroid cancer? What did they do for you? I would still talk to my doctor, your GYN that you had your children with, talk to him or her; or if you recently had an ocologist as him or her. Tell either or both that you now have this lump and you want it checked out. It stands to reason, if this just came up after the thyroid cancer, it might be related. Best to always get it checked to be sure and know what you are dealing with.
Posts.Title: can this be breast cancer

Posts.Content: This is all possible - and it all may be related to hormones. You have a four year old and this maybe related to something from your last pregnancy.  I would suggest NOT to do he mammogram but to ask for just ultra sound or sonogram this is more reliable anyway. Plus I would find someone to do a thermography - this will certainly all ease your mind.   Don't freak out - often when you appear so freaked out the doctors over diagnosis and begin unnecessary treatment.  And remember there are always second opinions.
Posts.Title: Freaking out!

Posts.Content: Dr Bryzinski is not part of MD Anderson but he is in Houston; his treatment has gained a lot attention as well as controversy. I heard he is unable to treat anyone that does not have brain tumors and of that I think his trial is closed. Very sad as I knew a fellow years ago that is still alive from going there. My daughter could not get in either, did not meet the FDA criteria at the time. If you want state of the art cancer treatments that are not invasive you have to go outside borders. I heard the use of IV therapy round the clock of some serums has resulted in remission of brain cancers; Germany uses hyperthermia in one way, other clinics use it differently all getting good results. Even one of our President's secretly went to a clinic for his cancer and lived years NED.  You are right we are not being told everything but with the internet today our eyes are open. We found out about some of the options when my daughter saw a girl that she thought died walking in the parking garage in full step, she said she went to Germany and kicked the chemo habit. Wish we knew it before my daughter got too much. Side effects will kill you, that we know.
Posts.Title: Best friend has stage 4 cancer - getting worse. I'm lost.

Posts.Content: We all have differences and that is what makes us special. With our cancer cases we are different too. Our Jesicha had both hormone sensitive and negative; the TN cancer was aggressive and was not effected by the chemo and radiation so she had to choose something different. We studied many modalities and she was using many things at home, hundreds of dollars and still it marched onward spreading. The whole body hyperthermia was of great interest to get all the cancer. Unable to go to Germany and that was near 40 thousand, a German doctor told us about a doctor in Mexico. There are some clinics down there that give it all a bad name, but there are ones that have been there for years and have a good reputation. Some have America doctors. We went there and in three weeks we got rid of the cancer no one could do in the states for three years. Her doctor has become a dear friend and he helps out with Jesicha's Hope because he believes in our mission or Jesicha's dream.  There are tons of things out there that is for sure. I see from our clients that we support what they use and get results and what does they don't respond to. I can give you a list of what is working. Also there is a resource list on the jesichashope site under cancer treatments; google it and read the list. You can get me through there too and can help you further if you need a consult or something and its free. Jesicha insisted never a charge, after two million spend on conventional she was drained but we know that is what cancer does, takes it all.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: You absolutely do not know. There are no guarantees I have found. My daughter gave it all she had and every chemo and radiation was used, it spread nonetheless. Sometimes you have to know in your heart when to switch gears; she did turn to alternative treatments that finally worked. She used to say, what they could not kill in three years with chemo they killed in three weeks with her alternative treatments.  A very happy camper.  What we found was certain cancers are resistant now to chemo but they are not resistant to naturally based treatments.  What it will come down to is what your sister in law wants and what she feels is her right choice.  Let her educate herself on both sides of treatments and then she will know what is best for her. If you google Jesicha's Hope there is lists there and also Jesicha's cancer story it might help. If you need support just holler.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: Yes I have read a lot on the cesium chloride. It is not for everyone as if you don't follow certain protocols you can get into trouble, heart palpations etc.  But it has good results from many.  I will look for the book, thank you. Jesicha used whole body hyperthermia as well as Sono photo dynamic therapy, and numerous cancer vaccines and add ons from her doctor in Mexico. We were amazed. When home we set everything up so she could continue.  It did kill the cancer. She had thirteen tumors on her skull alone that you could see - in three weeks all but three were there and they were shrinking too. It really woke us up. I see that you did not read her story - you will have to so you understand the importance of why I am out here telling the story - chemo is too damaging and you have to listen to your heart, not your peers. She learned that the hard way; but it was not in vain as long as others can learn from it and not repeat the same mistakes. This is sharing at its best.  Her story is worth reading and learning from it.  jesichashope dot org - click on about. There are many good proven by peers treatments; and if doctors knew and most do, they cannot by law tell you- the FDA and state governments hold an iron fist over doctors; they cannot tell you anything that is out of the box and that box is controlled by lobbyists from pharmas who control the FDA. If people only knew this they would understand why their doctors do not tell them alternatives that could save them. The old saying - if there was a cure my doctor would tell me - not so. They cannot. We listed a breakthough treatment called BX Antitoxin - so far those I know that have used it have markers down in eight weeks and good scans at six months out; two women ready for hospice, with no hope have passed their dates for pushing up daisies and back out in the world. Gives you a good feeling that hope is alive out there. You can reach me on that site - so keep up and let me know what you find and will do the same.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: Most people going to Germany seek out whole body hyperthermia. It has been  used for years with great success. If we do not live in Europe we tend to have blinders on as what is actually being used successfully elsewhere.  Our Jesicha sought the same and ended up using Hyperthemia both whole body and locally as well as SPDT that worked well to bring her tumors down in size or disappear.  These and more are all listed so others can read about them on the org site she started google jesichashope and read about them.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: I know your son and my daughter are looking down and trying hard to make people focus on what will make them well. They can see what does not work, they know it and through God's grace their mission shall come through us. We need to be sure you get well and spread the word of hope so others know and find hope. I believe we can seek the answers to why until the end of time in all the places we expect but truly I believe the answer is right here all the time, in our hearts, in our souls; we are more than just what people see, we are part of the whole, the big picture; life is experiencing this place to its fullest. We are so caught up in trivial things we fail to see the greatest of things are the simpliest of things. The most joy is found in the smallest of things. You say your son was filled with love, laughter and added joy to everywhere he went; not until they are angels do we see they were angels all along, here for a short time to leave a mark, absorb life to the fullest. We should be honored we were picked to be parents of these angels. We were special parents; God gave us a very special gift. Now we let them return and we are forever touched, forever blessed.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: You are so right. The good Lord gave you guidance and you followed your instincts. Many are so swept up on the moment they do not realize until it is too late that the chemo and radiation is destroying their bodies. You can cure the cancer but you cannot fix the mutilation that has happened to your organs; the poison and the burning all play havoc on you.  We learned the hard way but she brought a lot of awareness to others so they might not be forced to go the same route.  Keep your PH in line; no sugar - that is refined, and that goes for all those sugar laden products out there. Keep down on the wheat - use wheat berry products and cook with wheat berry flour; fresh fruits and vegetables and go easy on the meats. Lots of juicing, especially wheat grass.  Keep detoxified, support the immune system. I like a couple of supplements that are very supportive for cancer Hypoxsis and Crocetin. When you are shopping watch the products, Jesicha's Hope has a downloadable shopping list so you know what to buy organic and what you just have to scrub or peel.  You correctly pointed out the importance of YOU making the decision because it is YOUR life; others may not agree but it is important that you do what is right for you.  This is one of our biggest jobs at Jesicha's Hope, advocating for others. She knew the pressure put on her by her peers but she did overcome that; that is when she got the treatments she wanted, not what others wanted. If you do not have your heart into your treatment, you are working with half effort. I firmly believe in complete alignment with your body, mind and spirit, without it healing is difficult. Your decision on treatments should come from seeking all answers and then deciding; that is where we list our resources and let people cruise through to get educated; then with your eyes wide open listen to your heart - the message will be there.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body

Posts.Content: How did you make out? It has  been a few months since you posted.  I do agree the ultrasound would be the best approach and is usually what finds the most tumors in their early stages. Hope to hear you got things sorted out. On our site jesichashope we discuss the use of sonograms as well as thermography both of which we advocate as mammograms are not reliable and often wrongly give false diagnosis.
Posts.Title: confused

Posts.Content: Problem is the documentary while it pointed out the need for us to give up processed foods and live a life of foods not contaminated as processed foods are; it decidingly concentrated on veganism rather than to have continued on stressing eating organics over processed.  It used for example some studies that were flawed and compared our current cancer rate in the US to our not upholding veganism when in fact some of the statistics were based on countries that ate whole vegetables and organic meats, seafood, dairy and eggs, having lower disese statistics.  Point is we have higher rates of cancer not because we are eating organic foods which contain seafood, meats, dairy and eggs but because our dairy, eggs, meats and vegetables and fruits all are either processed, contaminated with pesticides or engineered [GMO]. There in is the crux of the matter.  Something good to see so long as you don't take it all for fact.
Posts.Title: Wife with breast cancer, desperate to try any "natural" drugs

Posts.Content: You can get it if you live in the US should you be willling to travel or there is also a program where the equipment is sent to you; it all depends on if you qualify. If you google jesichashope you will find a whole page on it under cancer treatments and from there see the options and what you can get.  We used it for advanced breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Very good information so far. There are truly a lot of remedies out there.  From experience both personally and through the organization site my daughter started - Jesicha's Hope - google it, I won't post the link; we see that many remedies work but not all have good results. With cancer you have to not fool around but go after the treatments with clinical knowledge and experience behind them. We list only treatments that work and do not harm the body.  Above all, the treatments are essential in your quest to cure your wife; these are important to kill the cancer but the cancer is a symptom of a cause. The cause needs to be considered as a most important intregal part of the quest for cure. We advocate balance and harmony as a whole. ALL foods, and products used daily needs be organic - NO chemical laden products. All food need be organic and NON GMO. We also help with doing a life regression to try to help discover where the body began its contamination; this helps in determining the amount of detoxing needed. If you need assistance please don't hesitate, there is no charge.  There is no magic bullet. Persistence and focus is essential. Hit or miss remedies often bring some relief but we find it far more prudent to develop a treatment protocol that focuses on the whole. Blessings to you.
Posts.Title: Wife with breast cancer, desperate to try any "natural" drugs

Posts.Content: You can contect to me whenever you feel you need. We are always here for people. I answer calls and emails always, even on holidays, often the most lonely for some.  Yesterday, I was saying good bye to my daughter, Jesicha's older sister as she was leaving to fly back home, a call came in from a woman crying about a tumor they just found on an MRI. My daughter hugged me and said, your calls are more important... she knew my taking the call would make Jesicha smile. We know and understand because we have been there. I think - if it were me or my daughter what would I want someone to do for me? And that is how we live.  I understand your frustration but you can find things that will work for you in keeping with your ability. Forget about what doctors say, they don't understand, don't want to or frustrated themselves for not having what it takes to cure. It is our job to take care of ourselves the best we can and to seek out options that doctors in our country cannot provide us. Remember its your body, your life, ask yourself, what is best for me - then seek it.  Blessing to you Carrie
Posts.Title: Wife with breast cancer, desperate to try any "natural" drugs

Posts.Content: The decision is up to you. There are many research studies that show over treatment of an otherwise benign lump can cause cancer that was never there. Some doctors have been known to treat these benign lumps as precancer giving radiation or chemo just to be sure. The end results from my observations is not good.  It is your choice, do some research before you take a step you cannot go back on.
Posts.Title: Do I really NEED this?

Posts.Content: Problem is the documentary while it pointed out the need for us to give up processed foods and live a life of foods not contaminated as processed foods are; it decidingly concentrated on veganism rather than to have continued on stressing eating organics over processed.  It used for example some studies that were flawed and compared our current cancer rate in the US to our not upholding veganism when in fact some of the statistics were based on countries that ate whole vegetables and organic meats, seafood, dairy and eggs, having lower disese statistics.  Point is we have higher rates of cancer not because we are eating organic foods which contain seafood, meats, dairy and eggs but because our dairy, eggs, meats and vegetables and fruits all are either processed, contaminated with pesticides or engineered [GMO]. There in is the crux of the matter.  Something good to see so long as you don't take it all for fact.
Posts.Title: Wife with breast cancer, desperate to try any "natural" drugs

Posts.Content: I think doing nothing is not a wise move but if you mean doing no western medicine treatment but using a non conventional protocol then you are no alone.  There are good options but you have to consider your particular case, what your stage is, what type it is, your diet, your lifestyle, etc. If you are looking for various options and links for data check jesichashope on google and go through the pages. If you need some assistance just ask.  The sooner people get into non invasive protocols the faster the recovery is seen.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: Some people I have worked with that tried the ketone diet are not finding a lot of difference either. If you do say the Gerson diet and modify it then most again are not finding the results they were looking for. It is in the extremes that there is found a difference and unfortunately most do not adhere to such a strict diet, no matter what it is.  If you have mets you might consider looking at SPDT, it works in most cases I have seen and over the cost of so many other things it is cost effective.  I have watch visible mets disappear, impressive. You can message me and I can direct you to some links.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: If you want to know where my daughter got it just message me. I would rather not display links or names of places publicly. I have no affiliatiion with the place, just that she went there and they were very good to her there.  I understand you did not call it quackery. Sometimes people say things that before they know facts. If I have not heard of something, I seek first information before I offer up an opinion. We are not all given to that practice.  Blessing to you Hilde
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: I find your remark unsubstantiated as SPDT - not photo sonic - is a treatment that has been widely used successfully in many countries around the word. The US is not the authority on what works. Their approval system is generally political and today has no bearing on what is good or works or not.  You would need equipment to do the SPDT as it needs a sensitizer and a light and/or sound source to activate the sensitizer.  As for cost you would have to contact a hospital or clinic that does it and there some in Europe, a good one in Singapore and one in Mexico. all could give you costs. Since I only used it from one place I could not tell you the cost elsewhere. And like all hospital treatments our bill was based on other treatments and medical needs my daughter needed like a blood transfusion.  Please don't throw out insensitive comments unless you know what you say is truth; my daughter had TNBC and became a statistic of chemo side effects to the heart. I know the pain. I was only trying to help another stop their mets.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer/ with no treatment

Posts.Content: My daughter had radiation to her right breast; there was damage done to her heart during the procedures. Although her liver had problems it was more due to the chemotherapy side effects as well; I have also heard that some of the chemo used could have possible side effects to the heart as well.  All in all you have to know and accpet the risks but unfortunately many are not told of these effects until it is too late.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Had it not been for the fact she came to me and asked me to finally help her with alternatives - what she was raised on but what others convinced her was wrong when she was first dxed, she would not have seen her cancer regress and die off giving her the idea for Jesicha's Hope - it is indeed her hope to give to others. I grasp hold of that everday and hold onto that; it is the last thing she created and so long as I keep it alive and keep giving hope then in someway her dream is keep alive and I see her in that dream.  As for the doctors that lied to her and told her nothing was wrong; forgiveness is small compared to what Karma will one day demonstrate. I know in their twisted heads they beleived her fate was sealed because they knew none of their drugs could cure her so it mattered not that their drugs was destroying her liver and heart, what did it matter that she would die from liver or heart failure first, the cancer would get her in the end if the liver or heart lasted that long but their bets were on one organ or another would fail first. Because she had so many siblings, discussions with doctors were spread out and now after two years the brothers and sisters are beginning to talk to me; and I am putting the pieces together. It is not good, they knew the combos and dosages were too much for her tiny body, the heart was having trouble and her tests at the beginnng shows a healthy heart; nothing else changed but their drugs. One doctor told my oldest daughter Jesicha would not see Thanksgiving because her heart was not going to be in it any more - huh? My daughter said - I get it now - the doctor had just read the latest results from the cardio tests because Jesicha was complaining she was having a hard time hiking small paths with the pups.  Yes, I get angry, I get mad, then I realize; I cannot bring her back; but I can take away patients from these....... doctors and save people from the same misery we all know they will experience if they go down that pathway; and then I know my energy is best spent in that direction. And I can think of you SpringFlowers and know people like you are out there doing the same bidding and the world may not be right but it is better with people like you trying.
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: geraldine - I am glad you have gotten to 8 years, the average survival is about 3 years so you are ONE LUCKY LADY.  God Bless your life.  Not sure about your hair - you can try to use some silica as a supplement and gelatin supplements - both help in giving the body back what it has lost. You can use black castor oil shampoo and conditioner - this helps in growing hair and thickening it. Hope this might help.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: My daughter had radiation to her right breast; there was damage done to her heart during the procedures. Although her liver had problems it was more due to the chemotherapy side effects as well; I have also heard that some of the chemo used could have possible side effects to the heart as well.  All in all you have to know and accpet the risks but unfortunately many are not told of these effects until it is too late.
Posts.Title: Liver damage after having radiation for breast cancer

Posts.Content: You made me smile - I had to when you explain cancer as the gift that keeps on giving - that is to doctor and others - it truely is and I could not have said it better.  I think described everything quite well.  I have also noticed that when you have cancer doctors begin to blame everything you get on the cancer. Somehow you are unable to catch anything else, only the cancer is in control of your body. This makes it hard to convince a doctor it is not cancer progression but maybe something else that needs a look at.  Or do doctor do talk overs - that is they will talk to whoever comes with you like you are not in the room; like the cancer has someone take the abilty to think from us? I recall the doctor telling me that maybe my daughter was falling and was not remembering things - because she was complaining of bumps on her head. My daughter was standing right next to me - what an insult.  Thing was the bumps on her head was progression and the doctor did not want to face she had not a clue what more to do.  It was time to move on. We have to take hold of our lives and not hand them over to just anyone. Our lives are all we got. Lets make good use of them and enjoy them.
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: Had it not been for the fact she came to me and asked me to finally help her with alternatives - what she was raised on but what others convinced her was wrong when she was first dxed, she would not have seen her cancer regress and die off giving her the idea for Jesicha's Hope - it is indeed her hope to give to others. I grasp hold of that everday and hold onto that; it is the last thing she created and so long as I keep it alive and keep giving hope then in someway her dream is keep alive and I see her in that dream.  As for the doctors that lied to her and told her nothing was wrong; forgiveness is small compared to what Karma will one day demonstrate. I know in their twisted heads they beleived her fate was sealed because they knew none of their drugs could cure her so it mattered not that their drugs was destroying her liver and heart, what did it matter that she would die from liver or heart failure first, the cancer would get her in the end if the liver or heart lasted that long but their bets were on one organ or another would fail first. Because she had so many siblings, discussions with doctors were spread out and now after two years the brothers and sisters are beginning to talk to me; and I am putting the pieces together. It is not good, they knew the combos and dosages were too much for her tiny body, the heart was having trouble and her tests at the beginnng shows a healthy heart; nothing else changed but their drugs. One doctor told my oldest daughter Jesicha would not see Thanksgiving because her heart was not going to be in it any more - huh? My daughter said - I get it now - the doctor had just read the latest results from the cardio tests because Jesicha was complaining she was having a hard time hiking small paths with the pups.  Yes, I get angry, I get mad, then I realize; I cannot bring her back; but I can take away patients from these....... doctors and save people from the same misery we all know they will experience if they go down that pathway; and then I know my energy is best spent in that direction. And I can think of you SpringFlowers and know people like you are out there doing the same bidding and the world may not be right but it is better with people like you trying.
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: Vickie,  You are facing the biggest challenge of your life, why wouldn't you feel overwhelmed? Sometimes what we think we are doing is suppose to be enough and if it does not work then maybe we are doing something wrong or we are bad or we are being punished. Thing is there is no real or right answer.  A great diet, great exercise and stilll cancer comes, hidden causes lurk about us and often unless we search hard we don't see them. I know because this is exactly what happened to my daughter, exercise, great diet, talented, busy as a bee but still cancer came, we discoved she was exposed unknowningly to benzine and chemicals in her shampoo added to that tipped the scales. see you never know. We found this out afterwards.  You can get depressed, its okay. Its okay to scream and its okay to get mad, its okay to be just plain feeling rotten.  But then you need also to get real angry at the cancer and not allow it to take any control of your life - what right really - does it have to take YOUR life?  Get mad and get even with it.  I hear too often doctors say - be friends with your cancer, really?  My daughter would beg to differ - she hated it and often said she locked it in the closet every morning - her wish and dream was to evict it. She managed that much. I do support work at Jesicha's Hope - for no charge - say thanks to Jesicha. Look up Nadine.
Posts.Title: Dealing with Stage IV metastic cancer and the emotions that come with it.

Posts.Content: My mother in law had breast cancer, with tumors visably on the outside; I did indeed smell that smell but associated it more with the fact of the open tumors than that it was cancer. Cancer in itself is not exactly rottening the flesh but it in itself does not die off and replicate but the old cancer cells just keep on replicating and existing. The blood supply is awkward and not sophisticated, very primitive so it makes exterior tumors pretty nasty and they leak. Certainly makes an odor. I have been around others and cared for them; others did not have that smell. I think it might be determined by how long the person had the cancer, the type of cell growth, etc. that might determine the odor.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: My daughter Jesicha had triple negative.  She went through many different types of chemo and radiation, two major surgeries and still it progressed.   As we later found out triple negative does not respond to the normal list of chemotherapy drugs because it is not hormone related but rather toxin related. She had a piece of her tumor sent out to find out what toxins were hidden inside, the results were alarming.  Her story is long and all documented, if you want to read it to learn what she did go to jesichashope online and then go to about Jesicha --- it is well detailed. I hope it might help someone.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: @Crabbie  How have you been doing, noticed it is now a year later.  Remembering back when I went through this with my daughter.  I know in my heart the chemo was what caused her death. And still the cancer progressed throuhg it all. If she had gone the alternative route in the beginning there would have been better results for sure. Like all things there are alternatives that are remedies and others that are professionally done. She did try some remedies along with the chemo and radiation but now I know they don't have much of an impact on something so aggressive. I hope you are doing better. Love to hear how you have been doing.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: @Crabbie  How have you been doing, noticed it is now a year later.  Remembering back when I went through this with my daughter.  I know in my heart the chemo was what caused her death. And still the cancer progressed throuhg it all. If she had gone the alternative route in the beginning there would have been better results for sure. Like all things there are alternatives that are remedies and others that are professionally done. She did try some remedies along with the chemo and radiation but now I know they don't have much of an impact on something so aggressive. I hope you are doing better. Love to hear how you have been doing.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: If she has progressed to a point where she is in a weakened condition chances are the cancer has been there for some time. Forcing her into any type of treatment she does not want will take time to get the court to order it and the treatment at this point, with her being so weak will more than likely just kill her. Also, forcing into something like that will cause her will to live to cease and she will no doubt just give up.  My thought would be at this point is to make her comfortable. Go along with her and tell her to keep the wound clean. You could ask for visiting nurses or hospice but she might just reject that also. If you can talk to a doctor that is willing perhaps to give her something for her breathing or pain it might help. You have to be careful with any antidepressants or anxiety medications that are often given for late stage cancers. this will further swing her moods and you don't want that. Make sure any doctor you talk to knows up front she has a personality disorder.  I take it your Dad is not in the picture. If she has a friend or relative that she trusts it might be time to call upon this person to intervene and see what she will accept. If it is only someone holistic, then there are alternative practioners that are able to handle things as this and may provide you with some thing. You might also ask them to prescribe some solution to put on the open lesion.  These lesions are not uncommon in some breast cancers but chances are if it is large the area of the tumor under the skin is larger and is more than likely only one of many. She may also have mets to other areas and depending on how long she has hidden this from others it could be in her spine or brain. It is all speculation at this point but one you and your brother must come to terms with.
Posts.Title: mom in denial

Posts.Content: Very good information. I would add Wheat Grass juice, very beneficial. Also near infrared is better than far due to the electomagnetic field that far infrared gives off. The near infrared is safer for those with or without cancer, but most especially for those will cancer; you can change out your far infrared with near infrared. You can also make your own near infrared sauna farily easily. It has benefits of healing as well as detoxifying. The less chemicals and bad environmental elements we do not cause our bodies to endure the better we will be. When facing surgery or any other treatment it is important that you do everything possible to keep your immune system energized. My daughter also used Hypoxis that is good for immune system and for liver detoxing.
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: It is a soft tissue cancer that, yes, sometimes appears in the limbs or abdomen. Both your sisters need some comprehensive protocols designed by a professional that understands their conditions, history and health status. Using treatments you read about, whether good or bad, alone without support will give you a hit or miss results.  If you google jesichashope you will find a list of resources that you can start to research from, many links are available to inform.  When fighing cancer and also MS you have to know how to do so working with people that have done so with success. The causes of cancer or other autoimmune disease is complex, you have to treat the whole body for a good outcome. BTW she needs to stop smoking, if she thinks she has pain now, lung cancer is extremely painful and not worth the smoke.
Posts.Title: Sis dx "Breast cancer with mets to bones."

Posts.Content: Very good information. I would add Wheat Grass juice, very beneficial. Also near infrared is better than far due to the electomagnetic field that far infrared gives off. The near infrared is safer for those with or without cancer, but most especially for those will cancer; you can change out your far infrared with near infrared. Posts.Title: What next....
